title: BRIEF-Bigtincan Holdings Enters Binding Stock Purchase Agreement With Xinnovation Inc To Acquire All Issued Stock Of Xinn
text:
BRIEF-Bigtincan Holdings Enters Binding Stock Purchase Agreement With Xinnovation Inc To Acquire All Issued Stock Of Xinn

Stock Markets 19 minutes ago (Sep 30, 2019 10:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Bigtincan Holdings Enters Binding Stock Purchase Agreement With Xinnovation Inc To Acquire All Issued Stock Of Xinn Sept 30 (Reuters) - Bigtincan Holdings Ltd : * ENTERED INTO BINDING STOCK PURCHASE AGREEMENT WITH XINNOVATION INC TO ACQUIRE ALL OF ISSUED STOCK OF XINN * PURCHASE PRICE WILL COMPRISE AN UP-FRONT CASH PAYMENT OF US$4.5 MILLION ON CLOSING OF TRANSACTION * CASH CONSIDERATION WILL BE PAID FROM BIGTINCAN'S EXISTING CASH RESERVES

BRIEF-Bigtincan Holdings Enters Binding Stock Purchase Agreement With Xinnovation Inc To Acquire All Issued Stock Of Xinn
description: BRIEF-Bigtincan Holdings Enters Binding Stock Purchase Agreement With Xinnovation Inc To Acquire All Issued Stock Of Xinn
